version_description:
Collect parcel from home

With pick@home, the mail carrier collects your consignment from your home or another address, such as your office.

To use pick@home, complete the free one-off registration process. Or do you already have a Login Swiss Post account? If so, register straightaway

- Modification for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
- General bug fixes and optimization
Bugfixing
Various adaptations due to the relaunch of the Swiss Post website and the uniform login. Adaptations to the App concerning the management of content and links.
Following requests from a large number of customers, it is now possible to select the language under “Settings”.
Bugfixing - Problem with location search

Location search
Location search adapted to the redesigned, more stable online service. Nothing changes for you in terms of content and structure. Internal testing has however shown that the results are now displayed faster.

Scan code/images

This update features the upgrade of codes and image scanning. Access is made easier by the centralized placement on the home screen. Scan the Swiss Post codes and save yourself the trouble of typing out long series of numbers. In addition to the upgrade, the scanner has been enhanced with an image scanner. To use it for the first time, you can scan the Christmas stamps (mid-November issue) – you’ll be amazed.

Important: The scan function can only be used if the Post-App has been allowed access to the camera function on your smartphone.

Scan code/images

This update features the upgrade of codes and image scanning. Access is made easier by the centralized placement on the home screen. Scan the Swiss Post codes and save yourself the trouble of typing out long series of numbers. In addition to the upgrade, the scanner has been enhanced with an image scanner. To use it for the first time, you can scan the Christmas stamps (mid-November issue) – you’ll be amazed.

Important: The scan function can only be used if the Post-App has been allowed access to the camera function on your smartphone.

This update is designed to make the image scanner more convenient to use.
From 2017, the scanner can be used to scan all postage stamps (including the 2016 Christmas stamps) and view more information and videos on the stamp motifs.

Modification of the app icon in line with Swiss Post’s new brand identity.
Bugfixing - Problem with location search

- Support for iPhone X
- Bugfixing – scanner

The Post-App has gone live with a fresh design and enhanced functionality. Many of its features originate from the valuable feedback of users. The Post-App provides valuable support and practical information on Swiss Post’s services.

The new Swiss Post app requires a minimum version of the operating system. Due to security requirements of the device manufacturers: iPhone devices from iOS9 are supported. Devices with older operating systems cannot update the Swiss Post app.

- Troubleshooting when starting the app, which could lead to a crash
- Increase performance by adjusting file sizes.
- Various other adjustments and improvements, please note the further information in the news of the app.

- Bug fixed that could cause the app to crash.
- Various other adjustments and improvements.

Optimizations for improved load performance
Adjustments of the scanner for further codes
Display Deliverylocation in Shipment Tracking
Various modifications to layout, functionality and content

- “News” and “Online services” messages implemented
- Various bugs fixed and performance improved

In addition to improving performance and loading times, the following points have been implemented:

- Quick actions (menu on the app icon) for the following functions:
o Scanner
o Track consignments
o SMS postage stamp
- Today-WIdget for the next locations
- Scanner detection accelerated
- Scanner also recognizes ITF barcodes
- Scanner: Note if the user accidentally scans the GAS code.
- Company name for branches with partners in the locations service.
- Various bugfixes and improvements for Accessibility
- Various bugfixes when entering addresses in Pick@home
- Various UI performance optimizations
- Retain mail: You travel – we store your mail. We are constantly developing our services, and are currently offering you this new option to place your holiday order via our Post-App (pilot project).

Light version for tablets
Various bug fixes

- Push notifications
- Numerous bug fixes
- Improved address search

- Numerous bug fixes
- Improved address search

- “News” and “Online services” messages implemented
- Various bugs fixed and performance improved
- Numerous bug fixes

This update contains the following changes:
• Various bug fixes

Customers have drawn our attention to the fact that a miscalculation is displayed in the time specification when searching for a location. This update fixes the error. Many thanks for the constructive input.
Adjustment of the location search with the display where branches are not open due to the current situation.

- The login remains in the app. For PIN-secured devices for 1 year, for unsecured devices 60 days
- pick@home with payment function for other services
- Various adjustments in user guidance and design (location search, pick@home, shipment tracking and much more)
- Security-relevant adaptation of the minimum version from the operating system to iOS 11
Bug fixes
Bug fixes (incl. Darkmode fix)
Bug fixes
Various adjustments, improvements and bug fixes

- The Post-App now informs users about incoming consignments with push notifications.
- Various adjustments, improvements and bug fixes
Various adjustments, improvements and bug fixes
Various adjustments, improvements and bug fixes
